nodes.text: The Namore system lay in the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. It contained the planet Namore.

The Namore system was introduced via the appearance of the planet Namore in "Live And In (Bleeding) Color...," a short companion narrative included in the 1995 sourcebook Heroes & Rogues. The book was written by Paul Sudlow and Rick Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, provided the system's name and placed it in grid square L-13.
